ygData.subject: Re: Tarew's Aquatic Ayre
ygData.msgSnippet: But that s not where the song is at all . . . The highest Bard in my guild (Level 31) gave me these directions as well, and turned out to be wrong. I assume
ygData.messageBody:
But that's not where the song is at all . . .

The highest Bard in my guild (Level 31) gave me these directions as well,
and turned out to be wrong. I assume the vendor has been moved since then.
The vendor who sells the song is in the first room on the left once you get
into the big room with the pillars. You have to open a door in this room
and then go around a corner.

-Musil

At 07:11 AM 5/23/99 , you wrote:
>From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
>On Sat, 22 May 1999, Dudley Stewart wrote:
>
>> Where in Highpass is the bank? I've looked and looked - and not found
it. I
>> also admit I scaled back my search somewhat out of concern over some nasty
>> prisoners I've heard about in there.
>
>Well, now that all my attempts to hide the spoiler have been
>thwarted by others quoting the message... The bank is in High
>Hold itself. On the first floor near the back there is a
>clerk for the inn. Go further back and one of the doors leads
>to the prison area. Take a right after going through that
>door and you'll come to a vendor at a counter who is the bank.
>Do not explore the prison area unless you are fairly high
>level. The prisoners are not locked up, and will attack you
>if you get too close. The guards will not attack them.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
